title: Video: Exmoor Emperor – Marlinspike (Live at Dental Records)
body:
_“Slow jams from the UK’s largest land mammal”_.

The inexplicable juxtaposition of Tintin’s head, R. Kelly’s body and the nose of a big fish. Clipped beats, glowy synth rushes, some SERIOUS fucking string swells, and the kind of vocals that make you go all gooey in the belly. Even if they are singing about Tintin’s head, R. Kelly’s body and the nose of a big fish.

Sightings [here](https://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Exmoor-Emperor/212755408764800 "Ssssssssss") [here](https://twitter.com/#!/exmooremperor "sssshhhh") [here](http://www.dental-records.co.uk/label/artists/ "hhhhhhhhhhh") and [here](http://www.exmooremperor.com/ "hhhhHHHHHHH!!!").
